"Seasonal Gathering": "During this Seasonal Event, new Gathering Materials will appear throughout the world."

"Also, during this Seasonal Event, Regional Mags become Seasonal Regional Mags.

You can increases Seasonal Regional Mags' fullness very quickly by feeding them Gathering Materials that can only be found during the Seasonal Event."

"During this Seasonal Event, new Gathering Materials will appear throughout the world.

When you have completed enough of Xitrae's tasks, you will unlock the ability to trade these Gathering Materials for limited-time items by selecting \"Exchange Items\" when talking to her."

"シーズナルイベント期間中は、
新たに２種類のギャザリング素材が出現します。

“アニバーティチョーク”は、
シーズナルリージョンマグに投入すると
まんぷく度を大きく上昇させることができます。"

"“ランダマイト”は、
破壊することで一度に複数種類の鉱石をたくさん集めることができます。"
